metadata.synopsis: PAD is played when players enter the Blushign Mermaid cellar.It has 2 different nodes: one for when players have already encountered the hag, one for when players haven't yet encountered the hag and are surprised to see haggy stuff in the cellar.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Debug teleport to the Blushing Mermaid Basement

0.speaker: Player
0.text: This place... why does it remind me of Auntie Ethel's home?

1.speaker: Player
1.text: No doubt about it - this is where the hag must be.
